./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_dff_reset.v Cov: 100% 

   1: module bsg_dff_reset #(width_p=-1, reset_val_p=0, harden_p=0)
   2:    (input   clk_i
   3:    ,input  reset_i
   4:     ,input  [width_p-1:0] data_i
   5:     ,output [width_p-1:0] data_o
   6:     );
   7: 
   8:    reg [width_p-1:0] data_r;
   9: 
  10:    assign data_o = data_r;
  11: 
  12:    always @(posedge clk_i)
  13:      begin
  14:         if (reset_i)
  15:           data_r <= width_p'(reset_val_p);
  16:         else
  17:           data_r <= data_i;
  18:      end
  19: 
  20: endmodule
  21:
